artist: Designer: Hargatai; Mill: Bancroft, Arnold; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Print on plain weave cotton with texture. Large (to 10") flowers. Vert repeat 27". Print on plain weave cotton. Large rust and purple flowers. 27" vertical repeat Purple/rust/Endive
text: In his gardens and his public showrooms Jack Larsen frequently takes advantage of the aesthetic created by focusing one individual type of flower. In this 1960s vision of Eden the design studio emphasized bold graphic elements and deep saturated colors.
title: Eden *
